resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107263</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107263</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206039</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Geologic Information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologische Informationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Information Géologique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação Geologic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le Informazioni Geologiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωλογικές πληροφορίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Información Geológica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">describes activities of the Geologic Division of the Department of the Interior. The Division's chief function is to carry out geologic and mineral resource surveys and mapping for the Department of the Interior. Topographic maps are only the best-known of its many products.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibt Aktivitäten der geologischen Abteilung 
des Innenministeriums. Die Hauptfunktion der Abteilung ist, 
Übersichten des geologischen und Mineralhilfsmittels und das Diagramm
für das Innenministerium durchzuführen. Topographische Karten 
sind nur seiner vielen Produkte das bekannteste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décrit des activités de la Division géologique 
du service de l'intérieur. La fonction en chef de la Division 
est d'effectuer des enquêtes de ressource géologique et minérale et
tracer pour le service de l'intérieur. Les cartes 
topographiques sont seulement les plus connues de ses nombreux 
produits.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descreve atividades da divisão geologic do 
departamento do interior. A função principal da divisão é 
realizar exames do recurso geologic e mineral e traçar para o 
departamento do interior. Os mapas topographic são somente os 
mais best-known de seus muitos produtos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">descrive le attività della divisione geologica del
reparto dell'interiore. La funzione principale della divisione 
è effettuare le indagini della risorsa mineraria geologica ed ed il 
tracciato per il reparto dell'interiore. I programmi topografici
sono soltanto il più noto dei suoi numerosi prodotti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγράφει τις δραστηριότητες του γεωλογικού τμήματος 
του τμήματος του εσωτερικού. Η λειτουργία του τμήματος 
προϊστάμενος είναι να πραγματοποιήσει τις έρευνες και τη 
χαρτογράφηση των γεωλογικών και ορυκτών στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς 
για το τμήμα του εσωτερικού. Οι τοπογραφικοί χάρτες είναι 
μόνο οι πιό γνωστοί των πολλών προϊόντων του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">describe actividades de la división geológica del
departamento del interior. La principal función de la división
es realizar encuestas sobre recurso geológico y mineral y asociar 
para el departamento del interior. Las correspondencias 
topográficas son solamente las más conocidas de sus muchos 
productos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206039</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107263</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/geologic-information</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
